00029 #ifndef __L4_COMPILER_H__
00030 #define __L4_COMPILER_H__
00031 
00032 #if !defined(__ASSEMBLY__) && !defined(__ASSEMBLER__)
00033 
00040 
00045 #ifndef L4_INLINE
00046 #ifndef __cplusplus
00047 #  ifdef __OPTIMIZE__
00048 #    define L4_INLINE_STATIC static __inline__
00049 #    define L4_INLINE_EXTERN extern __inline__
00050      /* gcc-4.3 implements c99 inline behaviour, i.e. we use the
00051       * 'extern  inline' there, 4.2 and below use 'static inline' */
00052 #    if (__GNUC__ == 4 && __GNUC_MINOR__ <= 2) || __GNUC__ <= 3
00053 #      define L4_INLINE L4_INLINE_STATIC
00054 #    else
00055 #      ifdef __GNUC_STDC_INLINE__
00056 #        define L4_INLINE L4_INLINE_STATIC
00057 #      else
00058 #        define L4_INLINE L4_INLINE_EXTERN
00059 #      endif
00060 #    endif
00061 #  else /* ! __OPTIMIZE__ */
00062 #    define L4_INLINE static
00063 #  endif /* ! __OPTIMIZE__ */
00064 #else /* __cplusplus */
00065 #  define L4_INLINE inline
00066 #endif  /* __cplusplus */
00067 #endif  /* L4_INLINE */
00068 
00069 
00075 #ifdef __ARM_EABI__
00076 #  define L4_DECLARE_CONSTRUCTOR(func, prio) \
00077     static void (* func ## _ctor__)(void) __attribute__((used,section(".init_array." L4_stringify(prio)))) = &func;
00078 #else
00079 #  define L4_DECLARE_CONSTRUCTOR(func, prio) \
00080     static void (* func ## _ctor__)(void) __attribute__((used,section(".ctors." L4_stringify(prio)))) = &func;
00081 #endif
00082 
00083 
00084 
00182 #ifndef __cplusplus
00183 #  define L4_NOTHROW__A       __attribute__((nothrow))
00184 #  define L4_NOTHROW
00185 #  define EXTERN_C_BEGIN
00186 #  define EXTERN_C_END
00187 #  define EXTERN_C
00188 #  ifndef __BEGIN_DECLS
00189 #    define __BEGIN_DECLS
00190 #  endif
00191 #  ifndef __END_DECLS
00192 #    define __END_DECLS
00193 #  endif
00194 #  define L4_DEFAULT_PARAM(x)
00195 #else /* __cplusplus */
00196 #  define L4_NOTHROW throw()
00197 #  define EXTERN_C_BEGIN extern "C" {
00198 #  define EXTERN_C_END }
00199 #  define EXTERN_C extern "C"
00200 #  ifndef __BEGIN_DECLS
00201 #    define __BEGIN_DECLS extern "C" {
00202 #  endif
00203 #  ifndef __END_DECLS
00204 #    define __END_DECLS }
00205 #  endif
00206 #  define L4_DEFAULT_PARAM(x) = x
00207 #endif /* __cplusplus */
00208 
00213 #define L4_NORETURN __attribute__((noreturn))
00214 
00219 #define L4_NOINSTRUMENT __attribute__((no_instrument_function))
00220 #ifndef L4_HIDDEN
00221 #  define L4_HIDDEN __attribute__((visibility("hidden")))
00222 #endif
00223 #ifndef L4_EXPORT
00224 #  define L4_EXPORT __attribute__((visibility("default")))
00225 #endif
00226 #define L4_STRONG_ALIAS(name, aliasname) L4__STRONG_ALIAS(name, aliasname)
00227 #define L4__STRONG_ALIAS(name, aliasname) \
00228   extern __typeof (name) aliasname __attribute__ ((alias (#name)));

00233 #include <l4/sys/linkage.h>
00234 
00235 #if __GNUC__ == 2 && __GNUC_MINOR__ < 96
00236 #define __builtin_expect(x, expected_value) (x)
00237 #endif
00238 
00239 #define EXPECT_TRUE(x)  __builtin_expect((x),1)   ///< Expression is likely to execute. \hideinitializer
00240 #define EXPECT_FALSE(x) __builtin_expect((x),0)   ///< Expression is unlikely to execute. \hideinitializer
00241 
00242 #if (__GNUC__ == 3 && __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 3) || __GNUC__ >= 4
00243 /* Make sure that the function is not removed by optimization. Without the
00244  * "used" attribute, unreferenced static functions are removed. */
00245 #define L4_STICKY(x)  __attribute__((used)) x         ///< Mark symbol sticky (even not there) \hideinitializer
00246 /* The deprecated attribute is available with 3.1 and higher (3.3 as here
00247  * is ok for us */
00248 # if (__GNUC__ == 4 && __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 5) || __GNUC__ >= 5
00249 # define L4_DEPRECATED(s) __attribute__((deprecated(s)))     ///< Mark symbol deprecated. \hideinitializer
00250 # else
00251 # define L4_DEPRECATED(s) __attribute__((deprecated))     ///< Mark symbol deprecated. \hideinitializer
00252 # endif
00253 #else
00254 /* The "used" attribute is not available with older gcc versions so simply
00255  * make sure that gcc doesn't warn about unused functions. */
00256 #define L4_STICKY(x)  __attribute__((unused)) x       ///< Mark symbol sticky (even not there).
00257 #define L4_DEPRECATED(s)                                ///< Mark symbol deprecated
00258 #endif
00259 
00260 #ifndef __GXX_EXPERIMENTAL_CXX0X__
00261 #ifndef static_assert
00262 #define static_assert(x, y) \
00263   do { (void)sizeof(char[-(!(x))]); } while (0)
00264 #endif
00265 #endif
00266 
00267 #define L4_stringify_helper(x) #x                       ///< stringify helper. \hideinitializer
00268 #define L4_stringify(x)        L4_stringify_helper(x)   ///< stringify. \hideinitializer
00269 
00270 #ifndef __ASSEMBLER__
00271 
00274 L4_INLINE void l4_barrier(void);
00275 
00279 L4_INLINE void l4_mb(void);
00280 
00284 L4_INLINE void l4_wmb(void);
00285 
00286 
00287 /* Implementations */
00288 L4_INLINE void l4_barrier(void)
00289 {
00290   __asm__ __volatile__ ("" : : : "memory");
00291 }
00292 
00293 L4_INLINE void l4_mb(void)
00294 {
00295   __asm__ __volatile__ ("" : : : "memory");
00296 }
00297 
00298 L4_INLINE void l4_wmb(void)
00299 {
00300   __asm__ __volatile__ ("" : : : "memory");
00301 }
00302 #endif
00303 
00306 #endif /* !__L4_COMPILER_H__ */
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
